tuv.seg: Child Benefit (previously known as Children's Allowance) is payable to the parents or guardians of children under 16 years of age, or under 18 years of age if the child is in full-time education, Youthreach training or has a disability. Child Benefit is not paid on behalf of 18-year olds

In Éirinn íoctar Sochar Linbh (tugadh Liúntas Leanaí air cheana) le tuismitheoirí nó le caomhnóirí leanaí atá faoi 16 mbliana d'aois, nó faoi 18 mbliana d'aois má bhíonn an leanbh in oideachas lánaimseartha, ar chúrsa traenála Youthreach nó má tá an leanbh faoi mhíchumas

For twins, Child Benefit is paid at one and a half times the normal monthly rate for each child. For triplets and other multiple births, Child Benefit is paid at double the normal monthly rate for each child
Má bhí ilbhreith agat beidh tú i dteideal deontais speisialta tráth na breithe agus nuair a bhíonn siad 4 bliana d'aois agus arís nuair a bhíonn siad 12 bhliain d'aois
Some Child Benefit customers are currently being registered for a Public Services Card by the Department of Social Protection
Tá Sochar Linbh iníoctha ag ceann go leith an ráta iomchuí do chúpla agus ag dúbailt an ráta iomchuí as triúr leanaí in aon bhreith agus ilbhreitheanna eile
You need to apply for Child Benefit within 12 months of:
Ní mór duit cur isteach ar íocaíocht laistigh de 12 mhí:
• The birth of your baby or
• De bhreith do linbh nó
• The month the child became a member of your family or
• Den mhí gur déanadh ball de do chlann den leanbh nó
• The month the family came to live in Ireland
• Den mhí ar tháinig an teaghlach le cónaí in Éirinn
If your baby is born in Ireland, when you register the birth of your baby the Department of Social Protection will begin a Child Benefit claim for your child
Má rugadh do leanbh in Éirinn, tar éis duit breith do linbh a chlárú, cuirfidh an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí éileamh ar Shochar Linbh ar bun don leanbh:
• If you are not claiming Child Benefit for another child a new claim is created by the Department and a partially completed claim form is sent to you for your signature and payment details

• Mura bhfuil éileamh agat cheana ar Shochar Linbh , cruthóidh an Roinn ceann nua agus cuirfear foirm éilimh chugat a mbeidh cuid áirithe di líonta amach cheana, chun do shíniú agus faisnéis i gcomhair na híocaíochta a fháil uait
This form also includes information on how to claim for your new baby online
Áirítear san fhoirm faisnéis maidir le hiarratas ar bun do leanbh nua ar line a dhéanamh
(Please note that you can only claim online if you are invited to do so by the Department.) The baby is also given a Personal Public Service (PPS) number
(Tabhair aire nach féidir leat iarratas ar líne a dhéanamh ach amháin má iarrann an Roinn duit é a dhéanamh.) Tabharfar Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí (PSP) don leanbh freisin
• If you are claiming Child Benefit for another child, your new baby is added to your Child Benefit claim and payment begins automatically from the month after the birth
• Má tá ceart agat cheana ar Shochar Linbh do leanbh eile, cuirfear do leanbh nua leis an éileamh seo agus íocfar an sochar go huathoibríoch ó mhí na breithe
A letter confirming payment will be sent to you by the Department
Cuirfidh an Roinn litir chugat chun an íocaíocht a deimhniú
The baby is also given a Personal Public Service (PPS) Number
Tabharfar Uimhir Phearsanta Seirbhíse Poiblí (PSP) don leanbh freisin
Children aged 16 and 17
Leanái atá 16 agus 17 mbliana d’aois

If you want to keep your Child Benefit for a disabled child or a child in full-time education or a child on a full-time Youthreach course aged under 18, you will need to fill in the right form (see 'How to apply' below) one month before your child's 16th birthday

Má tá tú ar cur isteach ar shíneadh le do Shochar Linbh do leanbh atá faoi mhíchumas nó do leanbh atá faoi 18 mbliana agus ag freastal ar oideachas lánaimseartha nó ar chúrsa lánaimseartha Youthreach, beidh ort foirm CB2 (féach 'Conas iarratas a dhéanamh thíos) a chomhlánú
This form must also be signed and offically stamped by:
Ní mór don fhoirm sin a bheith deimhnithe ag:
• The school or college if your child is in full-time education
• An scoil/coláiste más ag freastal ar an oideachas lánaimseartha atá do leanbh
• The Youthreach centre if your child is on a full-time Youthreach course
• Youthreach má tá do leanbh ag freastal ar chúrsa Youthreach nó
• A doctor if your child has a disability
• Dochtúir má tá do leanbh faoi mhíchumas
If your child is aged 16 or 17 and you are getting Child Benefit for him or her, you must notify the Department of Social Protection immediately if:
Ní mór duit scéal a chur ar an bpointe chuig an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí i dtaobh do linbh atá 16 nó 17 bliana d'aois agus ag freastal ar an oideachas lánaimseartha má:
• Your child leaves school/college/Youthreach course before the certified date or
• Fhágann do leanbh an scoil/coláiste/cúrsa YOUTHREACH nó FET roimh an dáta deimhnithe nó
• Your child is able to support himself or herself before reaching age 18 or the date certified by the doctor
• Bhíonn do leanbh in ann é/í féin a chothú roimh dó/dí 9 mbliana déag a bhaint amach nó an dáta atá deimhnithe ag an dochtúir
Full-time education (aged 16 and 17)
Má tá do pháiste os cionn 16 bliana d'aois agus in oideachas lánaimseartha gheobhaidh tú Sochar Linbh go dtí mí an Mheithimh
If your child is 16 or 17 years of age and in full-time education you will get Child Benefit until June
Ní bhfaighidh tú íocaíocht eile go dtí go bhfilleann do pháiste ar an oideachas lánaimseartha
The Child Benefit section will send you an application form in August
Seolfaidh an rannóg Sochair Linbh foirm CB2 chugat i mí Lúnasa
If your child returns to full-time education in September, fill in and return this application form
Má fhilleann do pháiste ar an oideachas lánaimseartha i Meán Fómhair, comhlánaigh foirm CB2 agus seol ar ais í
When you get your payment it will include any arrears due to you, including Child Benefit for July and August
Nuair a gheobhaidh tú d'íocaíocht, beidh aon riaráistí atá ag dul duit san áireamh, lena n-áirítear Sochar Linbh le haghaidh mí Iúil agus mí Lúnasa
If your child turns 18 during the summer you will get any arrears due up until the month they turn 18 – provided they return to education in September

Má bhaineann do leanbh 18 bhliain d’aois amach i rith an tsamhraidh, gheobhaidh tú aon riaráistí atá dlite suas go dtí an mhí a bhaineann siad 18 amach, ar choinníoll go bhfillfidh siad ar oideachas i Meán Fómhair
If you don't get a form in the post from the Child Benefit section, fill in form CB2 in September - see 'How to apply' below
Mura bhfaigheann tú foirm leis an bpost ón Rannóg an tSochair Linbh, ba chóir duit an fhoirm CB2 a líonadh i Meán Fómhair - féach 'Conas iarratas a dhéanamh' thíos
Child Benefit and EU Regulations
Sochar Linbh agus Rialacháin an AE
EU/EEA citizens and Swiss nationals working in Ireland satisfy the habitual residence condition for Child Benefit
Sásaíonn saoránaigh an AE/an LEE agus náisiúnaigh na hEilvéise atá ag obair in Éirinn, an coinníoll gnáthchónaithe do Shochar Linbh
This is also the case if the worker becomes unemployed and gets Jobseeker's Benefit
Is ionann an cás freisin má tá an t-oibrí a bheith dífhostaithe agus faigheann sé/sí Sochar Cuardaitheora Poist
If you are an EU/EEA citizen or a Swiss national and work in a country covered by EU Regulations, the country you work in usually pays Child Benefit even if your family is living in another country

Más saoránach den AE/LEE nó náisiúnach den Eilvéis tú, agus tú ag obair i dtír atá clúdaithe ag Rialacha an AE, is iondúil go n-íocann an tír ina bhfuil tú ag obair inti Sochar Linbh fiú amháin má tá do theaghlach ina gcónaí i dtír eile
However, if your children are living in another EU/EEA country you should still apply for any Family Benefits you are entitled to there
Má tá do leanaí ina gcónaí i dtír eile den AE/LEE ba chóir duit cur isteach ar aon Sochair Theaghlaigh dá bhfuil tú i dteideal sa tír sin freisin, áfach
You can find out more about Family Benefits and EU Regulations in Part 9 of the EU Guidelines on the Department of Social Protection's website
Má tá an Sochar Teaghlaigh a fhaigheann tú sa tír ina bhfuil cónaí ar do leanaí níos lú ná an íocaíocht Sochair Linbh anseo, íocfar an difríocht tríd an íocaíocht Sochair Linbh
You can also contact the Child Benefit Section for more information on how EU rules affect Child Benefit - see 'Where to apply' below
Le tuilleadh eolais a fháil ar thionchar Rialúcháin an AE ar Shochar Linbh, téigh i dteagmháil leis an Rannóg Sochair Linbh (féach 'Cá háit a dhéanfaidh mé iarratas' thíos)

Countries covered by EU Regulations are: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, the Netherlands, the United Kingdom (excluding the Channel Islands)

Is iad seo a leanas na tíortha atá clúdaithe ag Rialúcháin an AE: an Ostair, an Bheilg, an Bhulgáir, an Chróit, an Chipir, Poblacht na Seice, an Danmhairg, an Eastóin, an Fhionlainn, an Fhrainc, an Ghearmáin, an Ghréig, an Ungáir, an Íoslainn, Éire, an Iodáil, an Laitvia, Lichtinstéin, an Liotuáin, Lucsamburg, Málta, an Iorua, an Pholainn, an Phortaingéil, an Rómáin, an tSlóvaic, an tSlóivéin, an Spáinn, an tSualainn, an Eilvéis, an Ísiltír, an Ríocht Aontaithe (lasmuigh d'Oileáin Mhuir nIocht)
Non-EU/EEA citizens must be habitually resident in Ireland to quality for Child Benefit
Caithfidh daoine nach bhfuil ina saoránaigh den AE/den LEE a bheith ina ngnáthchónaí in Éirinn le bheith incháilithe ar Shochar Linbh
If you are a non-EU/EEA citizen and legally working in this State, you may qualify for Child Benefit if your child is also resident here
Mura bhfuil tú i do shaoránach den AE/den LEE agus má tá tú ag obair go dlíthiúil sa Stát seo, d'fhéadfadh sé go mbeifeá incháilithe ar Shochar Linbh dá mbeadh do leanbh ina chónaí anseo
More information is available in our document on habitual residence
Tá tuilleadh eolais ar ghnáthchónaí le fáil anseo
EU/EEA citizens and Swiss national covered by EU Regulations are required to certify every 4 months that they continue to work in this State
I láthair na huaire, éilítear ar shaoránaigh an AE/an LEE agus ar náisiúnaigh na hEilvéise atá clúdaithe ag Rialúcháin an AE dearbhú a thabhairt gach 3 mhí go bhfuil siad fós ag obair sa Stát
Non-EU/EEA citizens are also required to certify every 4 months that they and their children continue to live in this State
I láthair na huaire, éilítear ar dhaoine nach bhfuil ina saoránaigh den AE/den LEE dearbhú a thabhairt gach 4 mhí go bhfuil siad agus a leanaí fós ina gcónaí sa Stát
Fraudulent claims for Child Benefit
Éileamh mí-ionraic ar Shochar Linbh
Penalties for false or misleading statements made to obtain Child Benefit for you, or for any other person, include large fines or prison for up to three years
Féadtar pionós airgid nó téarma príosúnachta suas le trí bliana a ghearradh ar éinne a dhéanann ráiteas bréagach nó míthreorach d’fhonn Sochar Linbh a fháil dó féin nó d’éinne eile
You must notify the Department of Social Protection (DSP) in writing of any changes in circumstances which may affect your Child Benefit claim
Ní mór duit an Roinn Coimirce Sóisialaí (DSP) i scríbhinn a chur ar an eolas faoi aon athruithe a thagann ar do chúinsí a d’fhéadfadh difear a dhéanamh do d’éileamh ar Shochar Linbh
Changes which may affect your claim include:
I measc na n-athruithe a d’fhéadfadh difear a dhéanamh do d’éileamh tá an méid a leanas:
• Child is no longer with you or in your care
• Níl an leanbh i do theannta nó faoi do chúram a thuilleadh
• Change of post office or other financial institution
• Athrú Oifig an Phoist nó institiúid eile airgeadais
• Child aged 16 or 17 leaves full-time education
• Fágann leanbh 16 nó 17 mbliana d’aois oideachas lánaimseartha
• You or your child(ren) leave the State
• Fágann tusa nó do leanbh/leanaí an Stát
• You or your spouse, civil partner or cohabitant start work in another country
• Tosaíonn tú féin‚ do chéile nó do pháirtnéir sibhialta nó do chomháititheoir ag oibriú i dtír eile
You can use Form CB56 (pdf) to notify the DSP of any changes to your circumstances
Féadfaidh tú Foirm CB56 (pdf) a úsáid chun an DSP a chur ar an eolas faoi aon athruithe ar do chúinsí
Child Benefit in 2017
Ráta míosúil i 2017
│Family size │Monthly rate,│
Má fhaigheann tú Sochar Linbh den chéad uair, íoctar é ag tús an mhí a leanann breith do leanbh
│One child │140 │
│páiste amháin │€140 │
│Three │420 │ │children │ │
│triuir páistí │€420 │
│Four │560 │ │children │ │
│ceathrar páistí │€560 │
│Five │700 │ │children │ │
│cúigear páistí │€700 │
│Seven │980 │ │children │ │
│seachtar páistí │€980 │
│Eight │1,120 │ │children │ │
│ochtar páistí │€1,120 │
If you have twins you get one and a half times the normal monthly rate for each child
Íocfar sochar leanaí ar son cúpla ag 1.5 uair an ráta mhíosúil iomchuí do gach leanbh
For triplets and other multiple births, Child Benefit is paid at double the normal monthly rate for each child, provided at least three of the children remain qualified
Nuair atá triúr nó níos mó leanaí i gceist san ilbhreith íocfar an sochar ag dhá oiread an ráta mhíosúil iomchuí, sa chás go bhfuil ar a laghad triúr de na leanaí intofa i gcónaí
Child under 16 years of age
Leanbh atá faoi 16 bliana d'aois
If your baby is born in Ireland and you are not claiming for any other children, the Child Benefit section will send you an application form
Má rugadh do leanbh in Éirinn agus mura bhfuil éileamh agat ar bun leanaí eile, cuirfidh Rannóg an tSochair Linbh foirm iarratais chugat
This form also includes information on how to claim for your new baby online
Áirítear san fhoirm faisnéis maidir le hiarratas ar bun do leanbh nua ar line a dhéanamh
(Please note that you can only claim online if you are invited to do so by the Department.)
(Tabhair aire nach féidir leat iarratas ar líne a dhéanamh ach amháin má iarrann an Roinn duit é a dhéanamh.)
If you are claiming Child Benefit for another child, your new baby is added to your Child Benefit claim and payment begins automatically from the month after the birth
Má tá éileamh agat ar Shochar Linbh do leanbh eile, cuirfear do leanbh nua leis an éileamh ar Shochar Linbh seo agus íocfar an sochar go huathoibríoch ó mhí na breithe
A letter confirming payment will be sent to you by the Department
Cuirfidh an Roinn litir chugat chun an íocaíocht a dheimhniú
If your child is not born in Ireland or their birth is not registered within the required time (3 months) you must fill in Child Benefit (form CB1) (pdf)
Murar rugadh do leanbh in Éirinn nó mura bhfuil a breith cláraithe laistigh den tréimhse riachtanach (3 mhí) caithfidh tú Sochar Linbh (foirm CB1) (pdf) a líon isteach
You must send this form (CB1) with a copy of your baby's birth certificate (if your baby was not born in Ireland) by FREEPOST to the Child Benefit Section - see 'Where to apply' below
Ní mór duit é a sheoladh le cóip de theastas breithe do linbh (murar rugadh do leanbh in Éirinn) i SAORPHOST chuig Rannóg an tSochair Linbh - Féach 'Cá háit a dhéanfaidh mé iarratas’ thíos
Birth certificates are not required for children born in the State
Ní éilítear teastais bhreithe ar leanaí a rugadh sa Stát
Child Benefit is a universal payment
Íocaíocht uilíoch is ea Sochar Linbh
However, it is open to you at any time either to decline to proceed with a claim in respect of a new baby or to opt out of receiving payments for existing children
Áfach, is fútsa atá sé ag aon tráth chun éileamh maidir le leanbh nua a dhiúltú nó chun leanúint leis nó gan glacadh le híocaíochtaí le haghaidh leanaí atá agat cheana féin
To do this you write by FREEPOST to the Child Benefit Section - see 'Where to apply' below
Chun é seo a dhéanamh‚ cuireann tú seo i scríbhinn trí SHAORPHOST chuig an Rannóg Sochar Linbh – féach ‘Cá ndéanfaidh mé iarratas’ thíos
Children aged 16 and 17
Leanaí atá 16 agus 17 mbliana d’aois
To get Child Benefit for a child aged 16 or 17 fill in Child Benefit (form CB2) (pdf)
Chun Sochar Linbh a fháil do leanbh atá 16 nó 17 bhliain d’aois, líon isteach Sochar Linbh foirm CB2 (pdf)
If you are already getting Child Benefit for this child, the Child Benefit section will send you an application form in the post
Má tá tú ag fáil Sochar Linbh do do leanbh, cuirfidh an Rannóg an tSochair Linbh foirm iarratais chugat
Send your form by FREEPOST to the Child Benefit Section - see 'Where to apply' below
Seol do fhoirm trí SAORPHOIST chuig an Rannóg an tSochair Linbh - féach 'Cá háit a dhéanfaidh mé iarratas' thíos
If you have any difficulty filling in this form, staff in your social welfare local office will help you
Má tá aon deacracht agat ag líonadh isteach na foirme seo , tabharfaidh an fhoireann i d'oifig leasa shóisialaigh áitiúil cúnamh duit
Social Welfare Services Office
Oifig Sheirbhísí Leasa Shóisialaigh
St Oliver Plunkett Road
Bóthar Oilibhéir Phluincéid Naofa
Opening Hours:You can only contact this office by email or telephone
Uaireanta Oscailte:Ní féidir leat teagmháil a dhéanamh ach amháin ar an teileafón nó trí ríomh-phost
You can contact the Child Benefit section using the secure general enquiry form
Féadfaidh tú ríomhphost a sheoladh chuig an Rannóg Sochar Linbh trí leas a úsáid as an bhfoirm shlán fiosrúcháin Sochar Linbh
